name: The Prime Era
significance: The First War Against Nolem. Nike Prime was created. Nolem was trapped. The Champions scattered.

events.description: Through psychedelic visions, Cthulhu warns Stoner Nike that Nolem plans to exterminate all Nikes across the multiverse.
events.quote: Nolem has been using his shadow entities to meddle with creatures in other universes.

events.description: Despite his state, Stoner Nike contacts Pico the Rooster (military connections) and Hennifer (BETTY Project scientist).
A mysterious interdimensional cat with portal abilities joins the mission. His origins are unclear.
Using Shiro's portals and BETTY Project technology, five Champions are gathered from across the multiverse.
The minds who will build Nike Prime gather their resources.

scholars.name: Computer Coder Nike
scholars.contribution: Data transfer systems, created Charles AI

events.description: Combining technology from multiple dimensions, the Scholars build an unprecedented creation device.
Samples from 5,548 Nike variants gathered and integrated.
In months rather than years, Nike Prime matures in the chamber.
Nike Prime is released at 99% completion due to the Retnuhxed attack.
events.critical: The empathy core was not fully integrated.
events.quote: I wasn't born out of love or happiness. I was created out of necessity and desperation.

events.description: Nolem's shadow army pours through dimensional portals. Thousands of entities.
Gladiator leads, Ninja assassinates, Viking berserks, Boxer punches, Cyberpunk snipes.
Some soldiers and even Stoner Nike are temporarily corrupted during the battle.
Despite incomplete development, Nike Prime joins the battle.
The Singular of Entropy himself manifests on the battlefield.
Using Charles AI's calculations and Shiro's portal abilities, Nike Prime creates a space-time distortion field.
Nolem is caught in a dimension where spatial coordinates shift constantly, preventing escape.
Nike Prime vanishes INTO the trap with Nolem. Whether intentional or accidental is unclear.
Creating the dimensional anchor points burned through Shiro's life force.
To save Shiro's consciousness, Charles AI absorbs him. Charles AI gains portal abilities and cat-like personality.
events.result: Shiro no longer exists as separate entity.

events.description: Nolem is trapped. The immediate threat is over.
No one knows if he's alive, dead, or fighting eternally inside the trap.
The five Champions remain at the Colosseum, expecting Nike Prime to return.
After months of waiting, the Champions agree to return to their home dimensions.
events.quote: We'll meet again when Nike Prime returns.

otherLegendaries.description: What the other 22 Legendary Nikes were doing during the Prime Era
otherLegendaries.note: The framework allows any Legendary to have their own story of why they weren't at the Battle of the Colosseum.

examples.status: Protecting his home dimension—refused to leave

aftermath.immediate: Champions scatter to guard home dimensions
aftermath.longTerm: The Long Silence begins—thousands of years until the Echo Era
aftermath.nikePrime: Still inside the trap, still fighting Nolem, endlessly
aftermath.trap: Slowly weakening because Nike Prime couldn't BOND it shut (missing empathy core)
